word_mean: 换气过度：大量空气进入肺泡，肺泡过度换气造成二氧化碳张力降低，最终导致碱中毒
过度呼吸：指呼吸延长、快而深
这一动作常被用作癫痫及手足搐搦症时的检验方法

sentence.Network_en: Several notable researchers are studying the effects of hyperventilation.
sentence.Network_cn: 几位著名的研究人员正在研究通气过度的后果。

sentence.Network_en: Another typical combination is DKA, dehydration, and hyperventilation from pneumonia or sepsis.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一个典型的组合是DKA合并脱水, 及因肺炎或败血症导致的换气功能增强.

sentence.Network_en: Hyperventilation before a prolonged breath - hold is also vital.
sentence.Network_cn: 在挑战闭气时间纪录前强力呼吸也同样非常重要.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 包括换气过度 ( hyperventilation ) 甚至于癫痫发作等症状，会在高度紧张的状况下清楚的显示出来。其他还有肌肉疼痛、 关节嘎嘎响 …
持续过度换气（hyperventilation）：此种疗法乃需做大型的实验证明，但理论上，过度换气造成血中二氧化碳浓度降低，会使脑血管 …
低氧生理反应是多种多样的，最明显变化是过度通气（hyperventilation）、红细胞增多（Polycythemia）和呼吸性硷中毒（alkalosis）…
过度换气法(hyperventilation)维持动脉血中二氧化碳浓度(PaCO2)在28-35 mmHg间，以减少脑血流，降低颅内压，一般用于严重脑压 …

list.abs: 过度换气综合征(hyperventilation syndrome)是由于通气过度超过生理代谢需要而引起的一组症候群。发病时呼吸加深加快,患者诉有呼吸费力;胸闷压迫感或窒息感,可有胸痛.

entry.tran: （通常指因恐惧、疲惫或兴奋而）呼吸急促，通气过度
entry.def: If someone hyperventilates, they begin to breathe very fast in an uncontrollable way, usually because they are very frightened, tired, or excited.

example.ex: I hyperventilate when they come near me with the needle.
example.tran: 当他们拿着注射针走近我时，我的呼吸急速加快。

means.word_mean: 1. an increased depth and rate of breathing greater than demanded by the body needs; can cause dizziness and tingling of the fingers and toes and chest pain if continued

auth_sentence.content: The excessive breathing or hyperventilation that can occur during extreme anxiety can also disturb calcium levels.
auth_sentence.res_content: The excessive breathing or hyperventilation that can occur during extreme anxiety can also disturb calcium levels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The excessive breathing or hyperventilation that can occur during extreme anxiety can also disturb calcium levels.

auth_sentence.content: With that sort of on-paper clout behind Hyperventilation, it seems destined for cult status amongst certain crowds.
auth_sentence.res_content: With that sort of on-paper clout behind Hyperventilation, it seems destined for cult status amongst certain crowds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With that sort of on-paper clout behind Hyperventilation, it seems destined for cult status amongst certain crowds.

auth_sentence.content: Withdrawal can also cause delirium, hallucinations, rapid heart rate, high blood pressure and hyperventilation, Schwartz said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Withdrawal can also cause delirium, hallucinations, rapid heart rate, high blood pressure and hyperventilation, Schwartz said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Withdrawal can also cause delirium, hallucinations, rapid heart rate, high blood pressure and hyperventilation, Schwartz said.
